basic.description: Examines the role of the nurse in community health promotion. Topics and theory relevant to the three common approaches to health promotion: the medical approach, the behavioural approach and the socioenvironmental approach are reviewed. Introduces the processes involved in health program planning, marketing and evaluation. 3 hours lecture per week; 9 units (3 credits) course weight.
basic.subject: NURS
basic.title: Community Hlth Prom Theory
